key_risks: Geopolitical and supply chain risks due to U.S.-China trade tensions
Market cyclicality and intense competition in the semiconductor industry
Regulatory and legal risks, including hiring bias allegations
Slower-than-expected adoption of industrial automation solutions
controversies: Relocation of $1 billion manufacturing from China due to U.S. export regulations
$125,000 settlement with the U.S. Labor Department over hiring bias allegations
social_issues: Hiring bias allegations against Asian and Hispanic job applicants
governance_issues: Internal governance concerns raised by hiring bias settlement
Potential scrutiny over lobbying activities and influence on regulatory policies
